body:
This was [reported on the mailing list](https://mail.python.org/pipermail/cython-devel/2016-February/004674.html) a few years ago but I can't see an issue for it.

```cython
cdef extern from "<any>" namespace "std" nogil: 
    cdef cppclass any: 
        any() 
        any(const any& other) except + 
        any[ValueType](ValueType value) except + 
 
cdef any a 
```

```
Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
cdef extern from "<any>" namespace "std" nogil:
    cdef cppclass any:
        any()
        any(const any& other) except +
        any[ValueType](ValueType value) except +
                    ^
------------------------------------------------------------

test.pyx:5:21: undeclared name not builtin: ValueType

Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
cdef extern from "<any>" namespace "std" nogil:
    cdef cppclass any:
        any()
        any(const any& other) except +
        any[ValueType](ValueType value) except +
                    ^
------------------------------------------------------------

test.pyx:5:21: Array dimension not integer

Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
cdef extern from "<any>" namespace "std" nogil:
    cdef cppclass any:
        any()
        any(const any& other) except +
        any[ValueType](ValueType value) except +
                      ^
------------------------------------------------------------

test.pyx:5:23: 'ValueType' is not a type identifier

Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
cdef extern from "<any>" namespace "std" nogil:
    cdef cppclass any:
        any()
        any(const any& other) except +
        any[ValueType](ValueType value) except +
                     ^
------------------------------------------------------------

test.pyx:5:22: Missing name in declaration.
```

Yury's workaround works:
```cython
cdef extern from "<any>" namespace "std" nogil: 
    cdef cppclass any: 
        any() 
        any(const any& other) except + 
        any any[ValueType](ValueType value) except + 
 
cdef any a 
```
title: Templated constructors
